thread.section_title: Springfield Camping Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Springfield Camping | www.springfield-camping.co.uk
thread.title: Geoff Nathan
thread.title_full: Springfield Camping reviewed by Geoff Nathan

author: Geoff Nathan
title: Geoff Nathan
text: I searched for a long time for a superb warm down jacket with a detachable hood and found the Mountain Equipment Lightline, which I am very pleased with. It is well made, extremely warm and windproof and fits well. It arrived quickly by Royal Mail tracked. The colour (Cobalt) is smashing. Springfield Camping have done well for me.
